title: The Story of the Game Operation
excerpt: When you were a kid, it was always fun to play Operation, a game in which you fished parts out of a patient named Cavity Sam, and you had be precise or you'd complete an electric circuit and a buzzer would sound. It was not the first game based on an electric circuit- Ben Franklin actually developed one! And the idea behind Operation was originally based on believe it or not, desert survival.John Spinello created the initial concept for what became Operation in the early 1960s, when he was an industrial ...
